name: Lame Game - QuakShoot
description:
Quak Shooter! A very simple side scroller game where you shoot those pesky ducks!

Use the arrow keys to move from side to side, and "Space" to shoot.

The intent behind this game is to test the sidescroller element and speed.

For this reason, the game might be removed in the near future.

Submitted as part of the LameJam.
